message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to divide the money.  Let's end this here.
Bob, time is money! Every round you wait, the deal gets worse for you. Take this offer before it depreciates further!
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I'm still not happy with this arrangement. I'll accept a 45/55 split, but I think you should be prepared to negotiate further if you want to make a deal.
